objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Drama lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to work and career in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about work and career using neutral register
Students create original drama themed content about work and career in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Drama story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in drama context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within drama theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
